Uses of Class
fractal.Layer

  • Packages that use Layer 
    Package Description
    application  
    fractal  

    • Uses of Layer in application

      Methods in application with parameters of type Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Window.updateLayer(Layer newLayer)
      This is called when a new layer is selected in the layer view in order to load and display its palette.
      Constructors in application with parameters of type Layer 
      Constructor and Description
      Window(java.awt.Dimension dimension, int additionalWidth, Layer layer) 

    • Uses of Layer in fractal

      Subclasses of Layer in fractal 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HistogramLayer
      This is one of the two included layers that all installs of this program has.
      class  TriangleAverageLayer
      A layer which uses a rendering method called 'Triangle Average Inequality'.
      Methods in fractal that return Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Layer Layer.getLayerByAddress(java.lang.String address)
      This method is used primarily for loading in layers from a file.
      static Layer Layer.getLayerByType(java.lang.String type)
      This method is used to get a new instance of a Layer, by type.
